Leslie Ann Hope (born May 6, 1965) is a Canadian actress and director. Her best-known role was Teri Bauer in the Fox television series "24".
Hope has acted in many Canadian and American movies and television programs. In 1987 she played Madeleine Henry in "War and Remembrance". She played the novelist Lucy in "Paris, France" in 1994. She later played Joan Luss in FX's "The Strain".
Hope was born in Halifax, Nova Scotia.
